attributes.action: Include "made to penetrate" or "rape by envelopment" under rape laws
attributes.additional_details: Female-on-male rape currently does not legally count because the definition only covers penetration of the victim. Research shows that female-on-male rape is not simply a milder 'rape light' but causes moderate to severe trauma just as it does in female victims. Source: http://wp.lancs.ac.uk/forced-to-penetrate-cases/files/2016/11/Project-Report-Final.pdf?fbclid=IwAR3qzaK-uMtCI_zPsvmSi5c0A_3cJlbSQTShmsT1WMLJ0B67lVqcdYbewaY
attributes.background: Please include 'made to penetrate' or 'rape by envelopment' under rape laws.
